verses.verse: He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> on your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and I will speak with you. <S%H1696><s%>

The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into me when he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, <S%H5975><s%> and set me on my feet; <S%H7272><s%> and I heard <S%H8085><s%> him who spoke to me. <S%H1696><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> you to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to a nation <S%H1471><s%> of rebels <S%H4775><s%> who have rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against me. <S%H1><s%> They and their fathers have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me even to this very <S%H6106><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> are impudent <S%H7186><s%> and stiff-hearted: <S%H2389><s%> I am sending <S%H7971><s%> you to them; <S%H559><s%> and you shall tell them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H136><s%>

They, <S%H8085><s%> whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear, <S%H2308><s%> (for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>), yet shall know <S%H3045><s%> that there has been a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among them. <S%H8432><s%>

You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid of them, <S%H3372><s%> neither be afraid of their words, <S%H1697><s%> though briers <S%H5621><s%> and thorns <S%H5544><s%> are with you, <S%H3427><s%> and you do dwell among scorpions: <S%H6137><s%> don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid of their words, <S%H1697><s%> nor be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at their looks, <S%H6440><s%> though they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>
You shall speak <S%H1696><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> to them, <S%H8085><s%> whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear; <S%H2308><s%> for they are most rebellious. <S%H4805><s%>

But you, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> what I tell <S%H1696><s%> you; <S%H1961><s%> don't be rebellious <S%H4805><s%> like that rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> that which I give you. <S%H5414><s%>
When I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold, <S%H3027><s%> a hand was put <S%H7971><s%> forth to me; <S%H4039><s%> and, behold, a scroll of a book was therein; <S%H5612><s%>

He spread <S%H6566><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> me: <S%H3789><s%> and it was written within <S%H6440><s%> and without; <S%H268><s%> and there were written <S%H3789><s%> therein lamentations, <S%H7015><s%> and mourning, <S%H1899><s%> and woe. <S%H1958><s%>
